description: Light up the Tsurumi Island map.
Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Tsurumi Island.
Unlock all Shrines of Depths on Tsurumi Island.
Follow 6 Electro Seelie on Tsurumi Island in Inazuma.
Follow 6 Seelie on Tsurumi Island to their Seelie Courts.
Open 30 chests on Tsurumi Island in Inazuma.
Open 60 chests on Tsurumi Island in Inazuma.
Open 120 chests on Tsurumi Island in Inazuma.
Complete 4 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Tsurumi Island in Inazuma.
Complete 8 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Tsurumi Island in Inazuma.
Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Tsurumi Island in Inazuma.
Complete a certain author's reference-gathering commission.
requirements: Complete The Sun-Wheel and Mt. Kanna
steps:
Travel to Tsurumi Island
Approach the marked location from Tsurumi Island's Statue of The Seven. Fog will prevent players from traveling into the heart of the island.
Approach the marked location from Tsurumi Island's Statue of The Seven. Fog will prevent players from traveling into the heart of the island.

Travel to Tsurumi Island
Pass through the large gate. This clears the red fog over Tsurumi Island and allows access to the Teleport Waypoints in the heart of the island.
Pass through the large gate. This clears the red fog over Tsurumi Island and allows access to the Teleport Waypoints in the heart of the island.
